name: Syndicate
summary: Set in 2069, Syndicate takes players into a dark, Machiavellian world run without government oversight with many syndicates vying for total dominance of their local market place. With no one to question their intentions or actions, three mega corporations - Eurocorp, Cayman Global, and Aspari - are at the forefront of this brutal war for control of the pivotal American market. In the world of Syndicate, everything is digitally connected, including the people. Players aren't limited to the weapons in their hands. Through DART 6 bio-chip technology implanted in their head, players can slow down time and breach the digital world around them to take down their foes using a variety of upgradable hacking mechanics. Syndicate's blend of fast-paced, futuristic, action shooter settings and story combined with innovative chip breach gameplay instantly immerses players in a unique digital world.

esrb.synopsis: This is a first-person shooter in which players assume the role of a militarized “agent” who works for a corporation in the year 2069. Players use machine guns, sniper rifles, flamethrowers, and grenades to complete missions and kill human targets in frenetic combat. Firefights are highlighted by realistic gunfire and explosions; injured enemies scream in pain and emit large splashes of blood. Players can also perform melee attacks (e.g., snapping enemies' necks). Some weapons result in dismembered limbs, and dead bodies sustain additional blood effects when shot. A variety of cutscenes and interactive sequences depict more intense acts of violence: the execution of unarmed civilians; a character shooting himself in the head; a man getting sliced in half by a door. In one location (marked "XXX" and "Peepshow"), two holographic women in bikinis dance provocatively inside a storefront. The words “f**k,”“sh*t,” and “a*shole” can be heard in the dialogue.
